item.title: 0x6BAA OpenVPN Made Easy
item.description: Why Some people decide to buy some external VPN service for privacy. Personally, as I already commit all my internet usage to my ISP at home, I rather VPN from untrusted locations into my home instead, saving a few bucks and keeping my ISP as the sole entity holding that information. I guess I could try to use one of those VPN services (with better privacy terms than my ISP) at home but that would increase complexity too much for the rest of the household
